SECTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Find your dream journey, whether you want to travel privately or with a group, by train, boat, or plane.

SECTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Our collection of inspiring places to stay includes safari lodges, super-villas, and boutique riverboats.

JOURNEYS.DESCRIPTION: Get ready for a journey like no other. Our luxury packages offer the ultimate in comfort, style, and service. You have earned it.

PREMIUM_SERVICES.TITLE: Premium Services
PREMIUM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: Our exclusive experiences, just for you.

STAY.TITLE: STAY WITH US
STAY.DESCRIPTION: Our collection of inspiring places to stay.

TRAVEL.TITLE: TRAVEL WITH RESPONSABILITY
TRAVEL.DESCRIPTION:
We are committed to sustainable tourism and responsible travel practices.
 We are consider the environment, local communities, and cultural heritage in all our operations. You can travel with us knowing that you are making a positive impact.
 Also you can give a donation to help the children of the Andes.

cusco.title: Full Day Trek – Humantay Lake
cusco.subtitle: Explore the stunning Laguna Humantay on a one-day hike with spectacular views

highlights: Hike to the stunning Laguna Humantay with turquoise waters
Panoramic views of the Humantay and Salkantay snow-capped mountains
Opportunity to make a sacred offering with coca leaves
Luxury picnic with a three-course gourmet meal
Private transportation and expert guides
description.text: Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the Andes with this one-day hike to Laguna Humantay. Enjoy a spectacular view of the snow-capped mountains and relax with an exclusive gourmet picnic in Soraypampa.

itinerary.dayDescription: Early departure from Cusco, traveling to Soraypampa via Mollepata. A moderate 1.5-hour hike to Laguna Humantay, time to explore, take photos, and participate in a symbolic offering. Return to Soraypampa for a gourmet lunch before heading back to Cusco.

sampleJourney.daySubtitle: Cusco - Mollepata - Soraypampa - Laguna Humantay - Cusco
sampleJourney.dayDescription: Our journey begins early with a hotel pickup in Cusco at 06:30 am. After a 2.5-hour drive through breathtaking Andean landscapes, we arrive in Mollepata, where we take a short break for last-minute shopping and a briefing on local flora and fauna.

sampleJourney.daySubtitle: Start of the Hike in Soraypampa
sampleJourney.dayDescription: After another hour on a dirt road, we reach Soraypampa (3920 m.a.s.l.), the starting point of our hike. From here, we prepare for an uphill trek of approximately 1.5 hours, enjoying spectacular views of the Humantay and Salkantay snow-capped peaks. During the ascent, you will have the option to rent a horse if preferred.

Upon arriving at Laguna Humantay (4200 m.a.s.l.), we will be amazed by its intensely turquoise waters. Our guide will explain the history, geology, and spiritual significance of this sacred place for the local communities. You will also have the opportunity to make a traditional coca leaf offering to the Apus, the guardian spirits of the mountains.

sampleJourney.daySubtitle: Descent and Gourmet Lunch in Soraypampa
sampleJourney.dayDescription: After enjoying the beauty of the lagoon, we begin our descent back to Soraypampa. Here, a gourmet picnic-style lunch awaits us, featuring a three-course menu with special dietary options available upon request. Relax and take in the stunning views before boarding our transport back to Cusco.

Following lunch, we board our private transport for the return journey to Cusco, enjoying the scenic Andean landscapes along the way. Estimated arrival in Cusco at 18:30 pm, concluding an unforgettable experience.

customOptions.description: Additional options to enhance your experience

pricing.title: Included and Not Included
included: Hot beverages and snacks during the hike
First aid kit and emergency oxygen

cusco.title: FULL DAY TREK – CHONTA CONDORS VIEWPOINT
cusco.subtitle: Let’s visit the messengers of the gods as the Incas said… This very small town offers the most spectacular condors view of all our region.

highlights: Discover the breathtaking Apurimac Canyon, the deepest in South America.
Learn about the Inca culture and the majestic Andean condors soaring in the sky.
Trek through scenic landscapes with endemic flora and fauna.
Enjoy a gourmet picnic with stunning mountain views.
Private transportation and professional guides.
description.text: Experience the beauty of the Apurimac Canyon and observe the majestic Andean condors in their natural habitat. This full-day trek will take you through stunning Andean landscapes and offer a unique wildlife experience.

itinerary.dayDescription: Early morning departure from Cusco, passing through Limatambo and picturesque Andean villages. Trek to Chonta viewpoint where you'll witness the condors soaring in their natural habitat. Enjoy a picnic lunch before returning to Cusco in the evening.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Depart Cusco early in the morning and travel through the scenic Andean highlands, stopping in Limatambo to admire the landscapes and local culture.
Hike to the Chonta viewpoint with breathtaking views of the Apurimac Canyon. Observe the condors in flight as they glide above the deep canyon.
Enjoy a carefully prepared picnic lunch with stunning mountain and canyon views, featuring traditional Andean flavors.
Relax on the drive back to Cusco, arriving in the evening around 18:00 hrs.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these options

pricing.title: Includes and Excludes
included: Entrance fees to Chonta Condors Viewpoint.
First aid kit and oxygen bottle.

cusco.title: FULL DAY TREK – PALCOYO RAINBOW MOUNTAINS RANGE
cusco.subtitle: Discover the impressive and magical landscape of painted colored mountains that used to be 'water'.

highlights: Discover a less explored Rainbow Mountain range.
Short and easy hike with stunning panoramic views.
Visit the unique 'Stone Forest'.
Luxury picnic lunch with gourmet options.
Professional guides and private transportation.
description.text: Experience the beauty of the Palcoyo Rainbow Mountain range with an easy one-day trek. Enjoy breathtaking landscapes, colorful mountains, and the unique geological formations of the Stone Forest.

itinerary.dayDescription: Early morning departure from Cusco. Drive through the Andes to reach Palcoyo, passing picturesque villages and colonial bridges. Hike for about an hour to reach the viewpoint at 4900m, where you’ll admire the colorful mountains and the Red Valley. Enjoy a gourmet picnic lunch before returning to Cusco in the evening.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Depart Cusco early morning and travel through the scenic Andean highlands, stopping at Checacupe and Combapata along the way to see colonial bridges and charming villages.
Hike for about an hour to reach the main viewpoint at 4900m. Enjoy panoramic views of the Rainbow Mountain range, the Red Valley, and the Ausangate Mountain in the distance.
After the hike, enjoy a gourmet picnic lunch with spectacular views, featuring Andean flavors and a selection of drinks, including wine and hot coca tea.
Relax on the drive back to Cusco, arriving in the evening around 18:00 hrs.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these options

pricing.title: Includes and Excludes
included: First aid kit and oxygen bottle.

cusco.title: THE GREATEST FULL DAY TO VINICUNCA RAINBOW MOUNTAIN TREK
cusco.subtitle: A great day in this highest and incredible colorful mountain that looks surreal.

highlights: Trek to one of the most breathtaking natural wonders in the Andes.
Enjoy stunning panoramic views of the Rainbow Mountain colors.
Experience a challenging yet rewarding hike through high-altitude landscapes.
Learn about the geological formations and local Andean culture from expert guides.
Indulge in a luxury picnic lunch surrounded by the beauty of the mountains.
description.text: Uncover one of nature's latest discoveries: The Rainbow Mountain or Vinicunca. Enjoy a full-day trip where you'll trek through diverse landscapes, see endemic flora and fauna, and immerse yourself in local Andean culture.

itinerary.dayDescription: Depart early from Cusco, travel through scenic Andean villages, and trek to Vinicunca Rainbow Mountain. Enjoy a gourmet picnic lunch before returning to Cusco.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Early departure from Cusco, stopping in picturesque villages along the way before arriving at Pampachiri for the trek.
Hike through diverse landscapes, experiencing altitude changes and stunning Andean scenery before reaching the vibrant Rainbow Mountain.
After descending from Vinicunca, enjoy a gourmet picnic lunch in a secluded Andean setting.
Drive back to Cusco, arriving in the evening.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these options

pricing.title: Includes and Excludes
included: Entrance fees to Vinicunca Rainbow Mountain.
Luxury picnic lunch with gourmet meals.
First aid kit and oxygen bottle.

cusco.title: FULL DAY TREK – EXPRESS INCA TRAIL
cusco.subtitle: At least you have to enjoy the shortest and great day trip to the lost citadel of Machu Picchu… views, colors, feelings and smiles will accompany you

highlights: Hike the last portion of the original Inca trail to Machu Picchu.
Amazing views of Machu Picchu from Intipunku (Sun Gate).
Visit to Wiñaywayna archaeological site.
Luxury picnic lunch with gourmet options.
Professional guides and private transportation.
description.text: Experience an unforgettable one-day trek along the famous Inca Trail. Start from Km 104 and hike through breathtaking landscapes, passing by the stunning ruins of Wiñaywayna before reaching the Sun Gate for a breathtaking first view of Machu Picchu.

itinerary.dayDescription: Early morning departure from Cusco to Ollantaytambo to board the train to Km 104. Start the trek through the cloud forest, exploring Wiñaywayna before reaching Intipunku (Sun Gate) with stunning views of Machu Picchu. Descend to the citadel and take a bus to Aguas Calientes for a short break before returning to Cusco.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Pick-up from your hotel early in the morning and transfer to the train station in Ollantaytambo. Board the train to Km 104, the starting point of the trek. Begin hiking towards Wiñaywayna, a stunning archaeological site along the Inca Trail.
Continue trekking through lush cloud forests and breathtaking landscapes. Arrive at Intipunku (Sun Gate), where you’ll get your first magical glimpse of Machu Picchu from above.
Descend to Machu Picchu and take a short guided tour of the citadel. Capture stunning photos and explore its iconic structures before taking a bus down to Aguas Calientes.
Enjoy a short break in Aguas Calientes before boarding the train back to Ollantaytambo. Transfer back to Cusco, arriving in the evening.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these options

pricing.title: Includes and Excludes
included: Train tickets to Km 104 and back to Cusco
Bus ticket from Machu Picchu to Aguas Calientes

cusco.title: FULL DAY TREK – PALCOYO RAINBOW MOUNTAINS RANGE
cusco.subtitle: Discover the impressive and magical landscape of painted colored mountains that used to be 'water'

highlights: Pick up time: 06:30 am.
Trek starting time: 10:00 am.
Arrival to Cusco: 18:00 pm.
Difficulty: Challenging.
Meals included: Healthy snacks and luxury picnic lunch.
Best Season: March to November.
description.text: Embark on an unforgettable trek to the breathtaking Palcoyo Rainbow Mountains Range. Witness the natural artistry of colored mountains, enjoy stunning landscapes, and experience Andean culture along the way.

itinerary.dayDescription: Depart early from Cusco, drive through scenic Andean villages, hike to the colorful Pallay Punchu mountain, enjoy a luxury picnic lunch, and return to Cusco by evening.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Early departure from Cusco, traveling through picturesque villages before arriving in Layo for breakfast and trek preparation.
Hike through diverse Andean landscapes, reaching the spectacular Pallay Punchu, known for its naturally pigmented colors.
Enjoy a gourmet picnic lunch with breathtaking mountain and lake views.
Drive back to Cusco, arriving in the evening.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these options

pricing.title: Includes and Excludes
included: A private, hand-crafted and fully personalized Luxury trek from start to finish.
Expert guide assistants based on group size.
Luxury picnic lunch with gourmet meals, beverages, and a glass of wine/champagne.
Private transportation for customers and staff.
Dining tent, porcelain or ceramic crockery, and glassware.
First aid kit and oxygen bottle.

cusco.title: 2 DAYS/1 NIGHT – WAQRA PUKARA
cusco.subtitle: Discover the natural and archaeological beauty of Waqra Pukara

highlights: Explore the remote and mystical Waqra Pukara.
Enjoy a luxury glamping experience in the Andes.
Marvel at the breathtaking Apurimac Canyon views.
Experience gourmet dining under the Andean sky.
description.text: This two-day trek offers an off-the-beaten-path adventure to Waqra Pukara, an ancient fortress perched above the Apurimac Canyon. Enjoy stunning landscapes, Andean culture, and an exclusive glamping experience.

itinerary.dayDescription: Drive through the South Valley, hike through stunning Andean landscapes, and arrive at Waqra Pukara for an unforgettable night of glamping.
Enjoy a serene descent, visit the picturesque village of Campi, and return to Cusco with lasting memories of the journey.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Start your day with a scenic drive through Cusco’s South Valley, passing the tranquil Pomacanchis Lake. Upon arrival at Sangarara, meet the team and begin your trek. Follow an ancient Inca trail with panoramic views of the Apurimac Canyon. Reach the luxury glamping site near Waqra Pukara, enjoy a guided exploration of the ruins, and end the day with a gourmet dinner under the Andean stars.

Wake up to fresh mountain air and a hearty breakfast. Begin the scenic descent towards Campi, passing through rock formations and breathtaking canyon landscapes. Arrive at Campi and board a private vehicle back to Cusco, reflecting on an unforgettable Andean adventure.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these optional add-ons:

cusco.title: 9 DAYS/8 NIGHTS – CHOQUEQUIRAO TRAIL - GLAMPING
cusco.subtitle: The most complete route and amazing challenge to the deepest Inca Culture

highlights: Explore the uncharted Choquequirao archaeological site.
Hike through diverse ecosystems from cloud forests to mountain passes.
Experience breathtaking views of the Vilcabamba mountain range.
End your journey with a visit to the world-famous Machu Picchu.
description.text: This 9-day adventure takes you through one of the most demanding yet rewarding treks in Peru. You will hike through deep canyons, cross crystal-clear rivers, and visit two of the most iconic Inca sites: Choquequirao and Machu Picchu.

itinerary.dayDescription: Drive through scenic landscapes and start the trek from Capuliyoc down to Chiquiska.
Cross the Apurimac River and ascend to the stunning Choquequirao ruins.
A full day exploring the fascinating archaeological site of Choquequirao.
Ascend to Choquequirao Pass and descend through lush cloud forests to Maizal.
A challenging hike through high-altitude passes and remote Andean landscapes.
Cross Mariano Llamoja Pass with spectacular mountain views before descending to Collpapampa.
Walk through cloud forests and visit local coffee plantations.
Hike to Llaqtapata and take a train or walk to Aguas Calientes.
Explore the legendary Machu Picchu before returning to Cusco.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Begin your journey with a scenic drive from Cusco to Capuliyoc. From there, descend through a breathtaking canyon, surrounded by stunning mountain views, before reaching your first campsite at Chiquiska.
Hike through lush landscapes, crossing the Apurimac River and ascending to Choquequirao. Experience an amazing sunset over the ruins before settling into camp nearby.
Spend the day fully exploring the impressive ruins of Choquequirao, uncovering hidden terraces, temples, and water channels while learning about their history.

customOptions.description: Enhance your adventure with these optional experiences:

pricing.title: What’s Included & Excluded
included: Entrance fees to Choquequirao and Machu Picchu

highlights: Trek through stunning Andean landscapes
Explore ancient Incan ruins along the way
Cross the iconic Sun Gate into Machu Picchu
Experience a unique 5-day itinerary with an extra day for acclimatization
description.text: The Classic Inca Trail Plus is a 5-day adventure that takes you through breathtaking landscapes and ancient ruins, culminating at the magnificent Machu Picchu.

itinerary.daySubtitle: Start your journey through the Sacred Valley
itinerary.dayDescription: We depart from Cusco, drive through the Sacred Valley, and start trekking at Km 82, reaching our first campsite in Wayllabamba.
A challenging ascent to Warmiwañusca (Dead Woman’s Pass), the highest point of the trek, followed by a descent to our campsite at Pacaymayo.

itinerary.daySubtitle: Walk through Inca ruins and cloud forests
itinerary.dayDescription: We pass through Runkurakay and Sayacmarca, reaching the stunning viewpoint at Phuyupatamarca before descending to Wiñay Wayna.

itinerary.daySubtitle: Enter Machu Picchu through the Sun Gate
itinerary.dayDescription: An early morning trek to Inti Punku (Sun Gate) rewards us with a breathtaking first view of Machu Picchu before exploring the site.

itinerary.daySubtitle: Explore Machu Picchu and return to Cusco
itinerary.dayDescription: Enjoy a guided tour of Machu Picchu before heading back to Cusco via Aguas Calientes and train.

sampleJourney.daySubtitle: Check-in to your hotel in Cusco
sampleJourney.dayDescription: Acclimatize to the altitude with a relaxed evening in Cusco.

sampleJourney.daySubtitle: Spend a full day exploring the Lost City of the Incas
sampleJourney.dayDescription: Visit Machu Picchu with an expert guide and return to Cusco in the evening.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these additional options.

cusco.title: CHOQUEQUIRAO TRAIL – 5 DAYS/4 NIGHTS
cusco.subtitle: An adventurous journey to the hidden Incan city of Choquequirao

highlights: Explore the remote and majestic Choquequirao ruins.
Challenge yourself with a demanding trek through the Andes.
Witness breathtaking landscapes and diverse ecosystems.
Enjoy luxury camping with gourmet meals and massage sessions.
description.text: This 5-day trek to Choquequirao is a challenging yet rewarding adventure that takes you through deep canyons, cloud forests, and stunning Andean landscapes to reach the hidden Incan city.

itinerary.dayDescription: Begin your journey from Cusco, passing through Saywite and Capuliyoc before descending to Chiquiska for the night.
Hike through Playa Rosalina and Santa Rosa before ascending to the Choquequirao campsite.
Spend the day exploring the extensive ruins of Choquequirao, learning about Incan history and culture.
Begin your descent back through Marampata and Playa Rosalina, staying overnight in Chiquiska.
Complete the final ascent to Capuliyoc before returning to Cusco by private transport.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Start your adventure with a scenic drive from Cusco through the Andean highlands, stopping at Saywite to see the enigmatic carved stone before reaching Capuliyoc. Enjoy a gourmet picnic lunch before descending through breathtaking landscapes into the Apurimac canyon, arriving at the Chiquiska luxury campsite in the late afternoon. Enjoy a hot shower and a relaxing massage before a gourmet dinner under the stars.

Rise early for a hearty breakfast before descending to Playa Rosalina. Cross the suspension bridge and begin the challenging ascent through Santa Rosa and Marampata, where a gourmet lunch awaits with breathtaking views. The final stretch takes you through lush cloud forests before arriving at the luxury campsite near the Choquequirao ruins. After a hot shower and massage, enjoy a well-earned dinner.

Spend a full day exploring the hidden Incan city of Choquequirao, visiting its various sectors including temples, terraces, and astronomical observatories. Learn about its history and ongoing excavations before hiking to the Pacchayoc sector, where you'll witness beautiful waterfalls. Return to camp for a relaxing evening with gourmet dining and a final toast to this incredible adventure.

Begin the return journey, retracing your steps through Marampata and Santa Rosa. Descend towards Playa Rosalina and enjoy a gourmet lunch with spectacular views of the Apurimac River. A final push uphill takes you back to Chiquiska, where you’ll spend a restful night at the luxury campsite.

Enjoy a final sunrise over the canyon before making the last ascent to Capuliyoc. Celebrate your achievement with a gourmet farewell lunch before being transported back to Cusco, reminiscing on this unforgettable journey through Incan history and breathtaking landscapes.

customOptions.description: Enhance your journey with these optional experiences:

cusco.title: LUXURY HIDDEN INCA TRAIL – 4 DAYS/3 NIGHTS
cusco.subtitle: An exclusive journey through untouched Andean landscapes

highlights: Discover an exclusive, unexplored Inca trail.
Interact with authentic Andean communities and visit a local school.
Hike through breathtaking landscapes, lagoons, and mountain passes.
Explore the majestic Machu Picchu with an expert guide.
description.text: This one-of-a-kind trek leads you through a pristine Andean landscape, unveiling hidden archaeological sites, cultural exchanges with locals, and stunning natural wonders before culminating at the breathtaking Machu Picchu.

itinerary.dayDescription: Depart from Cusco, journey through the Sacred Valley, and trek towards the stunning Cochayoq campsite.
Ascend to the Terihuayjasa Pass, enjoy breathtaking views, and descend to the picturesque Quelqanqa campsite.
Visit a local school, then transfer to Ollantaytambo for a scenic train ride to Aguas Calientes.
Experience a guided tour of Machu Picchu before returning to Cusco by train and private vehicle.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Begin your journey from Cusco, traveling through the Sacred Valley with stops at viewpoints. Hike through scenic gorges, meeting locals and capturing stunning photographs of the diverse Andean wildlife. Enjoy a luxury campsite in Cochayoq with gourmet dining and professional massage services.

Hike through the Andes, passing the striking Yanacocha and Yuraccocha lagoons. Reach the Terihuayjasa Pass for spectacular panoramic views and a special ceremony honoring Pachamama. Descend to Quelqanqa, where you’ll relax with a hot shower and a luxurious evening under the stars.

Start the day by visiting a local school, engaging with children, and offering small gifts. Travel to Ollantaytambo, where you’ll board a scenic train to Aguas Calientes. Check into your hotel and prepare for the grand visit to Machu Picchu the following day.

Wake up early for a guided sunrise tour of Machu Picchu. Explore the hidden wonders of this iconic citadel before returning to Aguas Calientes for lunch. Board the train to Cusco, concluding your once-in-a-lifetime adventure.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these optional upgrades:

pricing.title: What’s Included & Excluded
included: All gourmet meals during the trek
Entrance fees to Machu Picchu and additional sites
notIncluded: Additional beverages not mentioned in the itinerary

highlights: Scenic valleys, mountains, and snow-covered peaks.
Less-crowded trek with authentic Andean culture.
Lakes with dazzling colors and stunning landscapes.
Traditional Andean communities preserving ancient customs.
Luxury camping experience with gourmet meals.
Hot showers and professional massages.
Visit to the hot springs in Lares.
Exploration of Machu Picchu with a professional guide.
description.text: This 4-day trek offers a unique opportunity to visit Machu Picchu through a less-crowded route filled with breathtaking landscapes and deep cultural experiences.

itinerary.dayTitle: Day 01: Cusco – Calca – Huaran – Cancha Cancha
itinerary.daySubtitle: Starting the trek through the Sacred Valley
itinerary.dayDescription: After breakfast, we drive to Huaran and start our trek, passing through Andean forests and traditional villages.

itinerary.dayTitle: Day 02: Cancha Cancha – Pachacutec Pass - Quiswarani
itinerary.daySubtitle: Reaching the highest point of the trek
itinerary.dayDescription: A challenging ascent to Pachacutec Pass (4,690m) rewards us with stunning glacier and lake views.

itinerary.dayTitle: Day 03: Quiswarani – Huillquijassa Pass – Lares – Aguas Calientes
itinerary.daySubtitle: Relaxing at Lares hot springs before reaching Aguas Calientes
itinerary.dayDescription: We ascend to Huillquijassa Pass (4,400m), admiring breathtaking views of lakes and valleys.

itinerary.daySubtitle: Exploring the Lost City of the Incas
itinerary.dayDescription: An early morning visit to Machu Picchu with a professional guide.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Experience a premium Andean campsite with comfortable sleeping arrangements.
Stay at a high-end campsite with breathtaking views of the Andes.
Spend a relaxing night in Aguas Calientes in a boutique hotel.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with optional add-ons:

pricing.title: What’s Included & Not Included
included: Private transportation from Cusco to trailhead.
Luxury campsite with hot showers and massages.
All meals (gourmet breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks).
Train ticket to and from Aguas Calientes.
notIncluded: Entrance for Huayna Picchu or Machu Picchu Mountain.

cusco.title: ROYAL INCA TRAIL 2 DAYS
cusco.subtitle: An exclusive journey through the ancient paths of the Incas, leading to the breathtaking Machu Picchu. Immerse yourself in history, nature, and adventure on this unforgettable trek.

highlights: Pick up time: 04:00 am
Trek starting time: 07:30 am
Arrival to Cusco: 19:00 pm
Minimum altitude: Ollantaytambo – 2792 masl/9160 ft
Maximum altitude: Sun Gate – 2720 masl/8924 ft
Distance covered: 12 kms/7.5 mls (6 hours walking approx.)
Difficulty: Moderate
Meals included: Boxed lunch, gourmet dinner
Best Season: April to October
Relevant features: Historical ruins, scenic trails, and the iconic Machu Picchu entrance via the Sun Gate
description.text: Walk in the footsteps of the Incas on this incredible 2-day trek, following the Royal Inca Trail to the majestic Machu Picchu. Enjoy stunning views, fascinating archaeological sites, and an exclusive journey through history.

itinerary.daySubtitle: Cusco – Km 104 – Wiñay Wayna – Machu Picchu
itinerary.dayDescription: Early morning departure from Cusco to Ollantaytambo, where you will board the train to Km 104. Begin your trek through breathtaking landscapes, visiting the impressive Wiñay Wayna ruins along the way. Continue the hike to the Sun Gate (Inti Punku), where you will catch your first magical glimpse of Machu Picchu. Descend to Aguas Calientes for an overnight stay in a luxury hotel.

Rise early for a guided tour of Machu Picchu, exploring its most significant sites and hidden gems. After an immersive experience in the Lost City of the Incas, descend to Aguas Calientes for lunch before boarding the train back to Cusco.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these additional options

pricing.title: Inclusions and Exclusions
included: A private, hand-crafted, and fully personalized luxury trek from start to finish.
Professional English-speaking guides with extensive knowledge of the route.
All entrance fees and permits, including Machu Picchu.
Luxury hotel accommodation in Aguas Calientes.
All meals prepared fresh by experienced chefs (B: Breakfast, L: Lunch, D: Dinner).
Luxury train service on the return journey.
All private overland transportation for customers.
First aid kit and oxygen bottle.
notIncluded: Extra transportation due to unforeseen circumstances.

images.alt: Scenic view along the Royal Inca Trail
First glimpse of Machu Picchu from the Sun Gate

cusco.title: QUARRY TRAIL – 4 days/3 nights
cusco.subtitle: Beautiful alternative trail. Explore ceremonial centers; discover the Andean lifestyle, find treasures

highlights: Explore ceremonial centers like Choquekilla.
Visit remote Andean communities.
Discover stunning natural formations like Perolniyoc waterfall.
Hike through the impressive Buena Negra Pass.
Visit the Sun Gate (Inti Punku).
description.text: If you are seeking an isolated trail filled with authentic Inca archaeological sites, diverse Andean flora and fauna, challenging mountain passes, and perfect photo opportunities, this program is perfect for you!

itinerary.dayTitle: Day 01: Cusco – Choquekilla – Socma – Perolniyoc waterfall - Rayanniyoc
itinerary.daySubtitle: Starting the trek through sacred sites and Andean villages.
itinerary.dayDescription: Depart early from Cusco and travel through the Sacred Valley to Choquekilla. Visit Socma community, hike to Perolniyoc waterfall, and explore Raqaypata before reaching Rayanniyoc campsite. Enjoy gourmet meals, a hot shower, and relaxing massages.

itinerary.dayTitle: Day 02: Rayanniyoc – Puccaqasa Pass – Buena Negra Pass – Sun Gate - Choquetacarpo
itinerary.daySubtitle: The most challenging day with rewarding views.
itinerary.dayDescription: Hike through Puccaqasa Pass (4400m) and Buena Negra Pass (4500m), enjoying stunning valley views. Celebrate with a champagne toast at the highest point before descending to Inti Punku (Sun Gate) and Choquetacarpo campsite. Relax with another gourmet dinner and massages.

itinerary.dayTitle: Day 03: Choquetacarpo – Cachicata Quarry – Ollantaytambo – Aguas Calientes
itinerary.daySubtitle: Exploring ancient Inca quarries and reaching Machu Picchu’s doorstep.
itinerary.dayDescription: Visit Cachicata quarry and learn about Inca construction techniques. Descend to Ollantaytambo, have lunch, and take the train to Aguas Calientes for an overnight stay.

itinerary.dayTitle: Day 04: Aguas Calientes - Machu Picchu - Aguas Calientes – Poroy – Cusco
itinerary.daySubtitle: Discovering the Lost City of the Incas.
itinerary.dayDescription: Early morning bus to Machu Picchu, guided tour, and optional hikes to Huayna Picchu or Machu Picchu Mountain. Return to Cusco via train.

customOptions.description: Enhance your trek with additional services.

pricing.title: Pricing Details
included: Train ticket to Aguas Calientes and back.
notIncluded: Sleeping bags and walking sticks (available for rent).
Hotel in Cusco before and after the trek.

cusco.title: THE GREATEST 2 DAYS TO VINICUNCA RAINBOW MOUNTAIN TREK
cusco.subtitle: Explore the breathtaking colors of the Rainbow Mountain and Red Valley

highlights: Discover the unique Rainbow Mountain with its surreal colors.
Experience the breathtaking views of the Red Valley.
Enjoy a luxurious glamping experience with gourmet meals.
Hike through stunning Andean landscapes with llamas and alpacas.
description.text: This 2-day luxury trek takes you to the stunning Vinicunca Rainbow Mountain and the mesmerizing Red Valley. Enjoy exclusive camping, gourmet dining, and unforgettable scenery as you explore this breathtaking Andean wonder.

itinerary.dayDescription: Journey through the Andes to reach Quesiuno, where your adventure begins. Hike through breathtaking landscapes, reaching Puca Pass before descending to the luxury campsite at Surinecocha.
Ascend to Rainbow Mountain to witness its vibrant colors before exploring the striking Red Valley. Enjoy a scenic descent and return to Cusco.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Start early with a scenic drive through the Andes to Quesiuno. Meet the support team and begin the trek towards Puca Pass, enjoying panoramic views of the turquoise lakes and Ausangate mountain. After lunch at Anantapata, continue uphill to Warmisaya Pass before descending to Surinecocha. Relax with a soothing massage, a hot shower, and a gourmet dinner under the stars.

Rise early and begin the gradual ascent to Rainbow Mountain. Take in the spectacular colors and stunning views before heading towards the Red Valley, where you'll be captivated by its contrasting landscapes. Descend to Llacto for a well-deserved gourmet lunch before returning to Cusco in private transportation.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these optional add-ons:

pricing.title: What’s Included & Excluded
included: All gourmet meals during the trek
Entrance fees to Rainbow Mountain and Red Valley
notIncluded: Personal riding horse (available for an extra cost)

cusco.title: SALKANTAY TRAIL – 5 DAYS/4 NIGHTS
cusco.subtitle: Views of the most spectacular landscapes, mountains, rainforest and more

highlights: Alternative trek to Machu Picchu avoiding crowds.
Breathtaking views of the Sacred Mountains and cloud forest.
Experience diverse ecosystems from high peaks to lush jungles.
Exclusive camping experience with luxury services.
description.text: The Salkantay Trek is a remote and scenic adventure through the high Andes, passing glacial peaks, cloud forests, and hidden Incan ruins before reaching Machu Picchu.

itinerary.dayDescription: Drive to Soraypampa and trek to Soyrococha, with breathtaking views of Salkantay and Humantay mountains.
Hike over the Salkantay Pass and descend into the cloud forest, reaching Collpapampa.
Journey through lush valleys, coffee plantations, and waterfalls before arriving at Playa Sahuayaco.
Visit the hidden Incan site of Llaqtapata before continuing to Aguas Calientes.
Explore the Lost City of the Incas with a guided tour before returning to Cusco.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Begin your adventure with a scenic drive to Soraypampa, passing picturesque villages and mountain views. Hike to Soyrococha, enjoying stunning vistas of Salkantay Mountain.
Ascend to Salkantay Pass (4,638m), where breathtaking glacier views await. Descend into the lush cloud forest and reach the warm Collpapampa valley.
Trek through lush jungle, passing waterfalls and coffee plantations before arriving at Playa Sahuayaco.
Hike to the hidden Inca ruins of Llaqtapata, with views of Machu Picchu. Continue down to Aguas Calientes.
Enjoy an early morning guided tour of Machu Picchu before returning to Cusco.

customOptions.description: Enhance your journey with these optional experiences:

pricing.title: What’s Included & Excluded
included: Train tickets from Hydroelectric to Aguas Calientes

cusco.title: HUMANTAY LAKE 2 DAYS
cusco.subtitle: Incredible day trip to the Head of Gods, as Humantay means. Spiritual masters; protective mountain of the Incas. Magnificent beauty and great experiences to enjoy

highlights: Pick up time: 06:30 am
Trek starting time: 10:30 am
Arrival to Cusco: 18:30 pm
Minimum altitude: Mollepata – 2803 masl/9196.2 ft
Maximum altitude Day 1: Humantay Lake – 4200 masl/13779.5 ft
Maximum altitude Day 2: Salkantay Pass – 4600 masl/15092 ft
Distance covered: 5.5 kms/3.4 mls (3 hours walking approx.)
Difficulty: Moderate to challenging on day 2
Meals included: Healthy snacks, luxury picnic lunch
Best Season: March to November
Relevant features: Stunning landscapes, perfect for those passionate about photography and nature lovers
description.text: Discover and be delighted with this beautiful 2-day trek in which you will have the opportunity to explore one of the most precious natural wonders of Cusco: Humantay Lake. Here you will take impressive photos of its turquoise waters and the imposing Mountain Guardians Humantay and Salkantay snowcapped mountains.

itinerary.dayDescription: Early pick-up from Cusco and transfer to Mollepata town. Enjoy the stunning landscape with views of snowcapped mountains and local communities. Then, continue to Soraypampa, where the trek begins. Hike up to Humantay Lake to witness its unique turquoise waters. After the hike, return to Soraypampa for a luxury picnic lunch and relax at the high-end campsite.

Start the day with a nourishing breakfast before hiking to Salkantay Pass, the highest point of the trek at 4,600m. Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the surrounding mountains. After some rest, descend back to the campsite for a gourmet lunch before returning to Cusco in the afternoon.

customOptions.description: Enhance your experience with these additional options

pricing.title: Inclusions and Exclusions
included: A private, hand-crafted, and fully personalized luxury trek from start to finish.
Professional English-speaking guides with extensive knowledge of the route.
Expert guide assistants depending on group size.
All meals prepared fresh on the spot by a well-trained chef (B: Breakfast, L: Lunch, D: Dinner).
Luxury picnic lunch with gourmet meals, beverages, and a glass of wine/champagne.
All private overland transportation for customers.
Private transportation for staff and camping equipment.
Dining tent with comfortable chairs, porcelain crockery, and glassware.
Portable chemical toilet and shower tent.
One night in a luxury bedroom tent with cot, sleeping bag, sheets, blanket, and pillows.
First aid kit and oxygen bottle.
notIncluded: Extra transportation due to unforeseen circumstances.
Personal riding horse (approx. PEN 100 per horse).

images.alt: Luxury picnic setup with mountain views

cusco.title: 4 DAYS/3 NIGHTS – CLASSIC INCA TRAIL
cusco.subtitle: Experience the legendary Inca Trail to Machu Picchu

highlights: Explore the iconic Inca Trail.
Pass through breathtaking Andean landscapes.
Visit historical Incan sites along the way.
Experience the sunrise at Machu Picchu.
description.text: The Classic Inca Trail is a unique adventure leading to the breathtaking ruins of Machu Picchu. This trek takes you through stunning mountain scenery, lush cloud forests, and ancient Incan ruins.

itinerary.dayDescription: Depart from Cusco and trek to Wayllabamba through stunning landscapes and archaeological sites.
Challenge yourself with a hike to Dead Woman’s Pass, the highest point on the trail.
Discover fascinating ruins and enjoy breathtaking views along the way.
Arrive at Machu Picchu for an unforgettable sunrise and guided tour.

sampleJourney.dayDescription: Begin your adventure from Cusco, passing through the Sacred Valley before arriving at the Inca Trail's starting point. Hike through lush landscapes, crossing the Urubamba River and visiting archaeological sites like Llactapata before reaching Wayllabamba for the night.

The most challenging day of the trek. Ascend to Dead Woman’s Pass (4,215m), the highest point on the trail, where you’ll be rewarded with spectacular panoramic views. Descend into the Pacaymayo Valley and set up camp for the night.

A day of breathtaking landscapes and Incan ruins. Trek through cloud forests and pass by ancient sites like Runkurakay, Sayacmarca, and Phuyupatamarca. Arrive at the stunning Wiñay Wayna ruins, where you’ll camp near the final stretch to Machu Picchu.

Wake up before dawn to hike to the Sun Gate, where you’ll witness the first light over Machu Picchu. Descend into the Lost City of the Incas for a guided tour, exploring its temples, terraces, and hidden corners before returning to Cusco.

ABOUTUS.DESCRIPTION: We are a team of travel experts dedicated to providing unique and unforgettable experiences in Peru. Our passion for travel and commitment to excellence ensure that every journey is tailored to your needs, interests, and preferences. Whether you're seeking adventure, relaxation, or cultural immersion, we're here to make your dream vacation a reality.
